alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 11 at 11:34PM CDT until April 12 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WOODRUFF AND SOUTHEASTERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 1133 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Searcy, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Searcy... Augusta... Bald Knob... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... West Point... Pryor... Hurricane Lake WMA... Dixie... McClelland... Gregory... Worden... Armstrong Springs... Georgetown... Plainview in White County... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 40 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
